All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CountTableController
Controller for the count table which shares a resource with the text area, when in use.
HTMLWordCounter
A default instance for the HTML portion of the word count.
Main
Entrypoint to the JavaFX application.
mainPaneController
Main pane that holds all other panes within a BorderPane with static orientation.
SharedWordCount
A linking class shared between TextAreaController and CountTableController enabling them to access the same instance of a word count.
StringSanitizer
Class with static methods for removing HTML tags and punctuation from plaintext.
TextAreaController
Controller for the TextArea which handles wordcount while actively typing.
TextSelection
Selects a portion of text from a file from a given character string to an ending character string exclusive.
webViewController
Controller for the WebView which currently has no function due to static loading of TheRaven.htm
WordCount
POJO to hold a word and the count for that word.
WordCountHelper
Helper function for the WordCountTable and WebView which loads the correct configuration of WordCountMap depending on the source.
WordCountMap
WordCountMap provides the mapping of words and their occurrences from an Array of words.
